<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 16"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Avalanche Strike](/Feats.aspx?ID=6372) <actions string="Three Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=535" />
<trait label="Flourish" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=606" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 207 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetype** [Mauler](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=256)

**Prerequisites**
[Mauler Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=6368)

**Requirements**
You are wielding a melee weapon in two hands.

</column>

---

You attack all nearby adversaries. Make a melee [Strike](/Actions.aspx?ID=2306) with your two-handed weapon against each enemy within its melee reach. Each attack counts toward your [multiple attack penalty](/Rules.aspx?ID=2289), but don’t increase your penalty until you have made all your attacks.
name: Avalanche Strike
requirement: You are wielding a melee weapon in two hands.
